Title: Error_ The type initializer for 'Oracle.DataAccess.Client. OracleConnectionStringBuilder' threw an exception. _ Community
Author: Christian Hauggaard
Text: Testing the connection to a new Oracle data source results in an error message. However, using an ADO.net Any Source or the local oracle client via TNS connection succeeds.  There may be a conflict between Oracle Native Client and Oracle Data Provider Remove the Oracle Native Client and install only the Oracle Data Provider according to the instructions provided in the below article
